H1581.def: = large quadruped mammal, which may reach a height of 2 m. or more; dromedaries are bigger and a uniform light fawn color; bactrians are darker; they are suited to life in desert areas, store excess food in their humps, can go without water for long periods, and can make long journeys through dry areas; ◄ Camelus dromedarius and Camelus bactrianus; ► they are used for riding and for carrying heavy loads and pulling carts; their hair is woven into cloth used for making tents or outer robes; their milk is used as food and drink; ≈ they are a symbol of wealth and commerce, but unclean and not to be eaten

H3967.def: = state in which a countable entity is one hundred in number

H5315.def: = the part of the body connecting the head to the rest of the body and containing the passageways for blood, air, and food; ≈ associated with breathing, appetite, and life and often used metonymically to refer to the entire body and the personality inhabiting it

H2543.def: = domestic animal belonging to the same family as the horse, but smaller and with longer ears; it can have variety of colors from dark brown, through light brown to gray and occasionally white; ◄ |iEquus Asinus africanus;|i* ► used to ride on, carry loads, or do other work; ≈ highly regarded; for male see {L:עַיִר<SDBH:עַיִר>}; female see {L:אָתֹון<SDBH:אָתֹון>}

H120.def: = human being as an individual or as a class of living creatures; sometimes explicitly subdivided between {L:male<SDBH:זָכָר>} and {L:female<SDBH:נְקֵבָה>}; ≈ associated with mortality

H7227.def: = state in which an object is very large in size

H5307.def: = process by which humans, animals, or objects move from a higher level to a lower level, typically at a high speed and without control

H2491.def: = state in which humans or animal are fatally wounded with a sharp object

H4421.def: = armed conflict between different countries or different groups within a country

H430.def: plural with plural meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations

H3427.def: = action by which humans assume a sitting position in a certain location and remain in that position for some time; ≈ sometimes associated with a certain status, role, or common activity

H5704.def: particle linking an event to a point in space; = relation indicating that event X ends at point in space Y

H1473.def: = causative action by which a group of people is forced to leave their country to settle somewhere else for an indefinite amount of time

H2677.def: = one part of an object or substance that has been divided into two parts

H7626.def: = stick ◄ usually made of wood; ► attribute of a shepherd or a ruler, but also used for other purposes, such as beating, walking, fighting, etc.; ≈ associated with shepherding, authority, punishment

H4519.def: = man, tribe, and territory; ◄ son of {L:Joseph<SDBH:יֹוסֵף>}; ► founder of one of the tribes of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}

H3427.def: = action by which humans assume a sitting position in a certain location and remain in that position for some time; ≈ sometimes associated with a certain status, role, or common activity

H776.def: = the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land

H1316.def: = region; ◄ north-east of the River {L:Jordan<SDBH:יַרְדֵּן>}, ► at one time ruled by king {L:Og<SDBH:עֹוג>}, later assigned to half of the tribe of {L:Manasseh<SDBH:מְנַשֶּׁה>}

H5704.def: particle linking an event to a point in space; = relation indicating that event X ends at point in space Y

H8149.def: = mountain, also known as {L:Hermon<SDBH:חֶרְמֹון>}, {L:Sion<SDBH:שִׂיאֹון>}, and {L:Sirion<SDBH:שִׂרְיֹון>}; ◄ part of the Anti-Lebanon range; located north-east of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}

H2022.def: = a relatively high elevation of the earth’s surface; generally higher than a {L:hill<SDBH:גִּבְעָה>}

H2768.def: = mountain, also known as {L:Senir<SDBH:שְׂנִיר>}, {L:Sion<SDBH:שִׂיאֹון>}, and  {L:Sirion<SDBH:שִׂרְיֹון>}; ◄ part of the Anti-Lebanon range; located north-east of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}

H428.def: = marker identifying a set of multiple objects with a set that already exists in the mind of the hearers

H7218.def: = upper part of the human body, or the front or upper part of the body of an animal, typically separated from the rest of the body by a neck, and containing the brain, mouth, and sense organs; ≈ associated with the entire person, that person's life, and that person's responsibilities

H1.def: = direct male progenitor; ► who normally provides protection, care, instruction, and discipline; ≈ is usually regarded with respect and associated with wisdom, security, and comfort

H1004.def: = construction surrounded by walls and covered with a roof; ◄ normally made of stones, wood, or clay; ► to be used as living quarters, for storage, as a prison, as a sanctuary, etc.; sometimes used to denote a smaller part of a large construction

H6081.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Midian<SDBH:מִדְיָן>}, son of {L:Keturah<SDBH:קְטוּרָה>}, wife of {L:Abraham<SDBH:אַבְרָהָם>}; ► founder of a Midianite clan

H1368.def: = a human being, animal, or supernatural being who is renowned for his characteristics, such as physical strength, power, bravery, skill, wealth, good character, or a combination thereof

H582.def: = human being; ◄ created by God; ≈ often associated with weakness, fragility, and mortality

H8034.def: = one or more words by which a person, deity, place or object is known, addressed, remembered, or referred to; ≈ regarded as a core element of one's identity

H4603.def: = action by which humans do something to (other) humans or deities that is not in line with the behavior that they committed themselves to

H430.def: plural with plural meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations

H1.def: = direct male progenitor; ► who normally provides protection, care, instruction, and discipline; ≈ is usually regarded with respect and associated with wisdom, security, and comfort

H310.def: = the side or part of something away from the spectator or from the direction in which it moves or faces

H776.def: = the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land

H834.def: = a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

H8045.def: = causative action by which humans, deities, or events completely remove humans, animals, or objects from existence; ◄ by (a usually unnatural) death, aggression, hardship, disaster, destruction, or direct divine intervention; ► often as punishment

H430.def: plural with plural meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations

H3478.def: = man, also known as {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and {L:Jeshurun<SDBH:יְשֻׁרוּן>}, including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of {L:Isaac<SDBH:יִצְחָק>} and {L:Rebekah<SDBH:רִבְקָה>}, brother of {L:Esau<SDBH:עֵשָׂו>}, and ► father of twelve sons -- after whom the tribes of Israel were named -- and one daughter

H5782.def: = process by which someone wakes up from his sleep

H853.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H7307.def: = an invisible being that is in a direct relation to and under control of God and one of his manifestation, often described as a substance that can be poured out, ► through whom the universe is created and animated; it can manifest itself as an invisible force equipping humans with wisdom, skill, and strength for specific tasks; it can also manifest itself as a movement of air through the bodies of animate creatures (breath) or through nature (wind)

H6322.def: = man, to be identified with {L:Tiglath-Pileser<SDBH:תִּגְלַת פִּלְאֶסֶר>} III; ► king of {L:Assyria<SDBH:אַשּׁוּר>}, contemporary of {L:Ahaz<SDBH:אָחָז>} king of {L:Judah<SDBH:יְהוּדָה>}, who attacked the northern kingdom of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>} during the reign of {L:Menahem<SDBH:מְנַחֵם>}, and exiled part of the population during the reign of king {L:Pekah<SDBH:פֶּקַח>}

H4428.def: = supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity

H804.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Shem<SDBH:שֵׁם>}; ► regarded as founder of Assyria

H8407.def: = man, also known as {L:Pul<SDBH:פּוּל>}, to be identified with Tiglath-Pileser III; ► king of {L:Assyria<SDBH:אַשּׁוּר>}, contemporary of {L:Ahaz<SDBH:אָחָז>} king of {L:Judah<SDBH:יְהוּדָה>}, who exiled part of the northern kingdom of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>} during the reign of king {L:Pekah<SDBH:פֶּקַח>}

H2677.def: = one part of an object or substance that has been divided into two parts

H7626.def: = stick ◄ usually made of wood; ► attribute of a shepherd or a ruler, but also used for other purposes, such as beating, walking, fighting, etc.; ≈ associated with shepherding, authority, punishment

H4519.def: = man, tribe, and territory; ◄ son of {L:Joseph<SDBH:יֹוסֵף>}; ► founder of one of the tribes of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}

H1540.def: = action by which someone takes off his/her clothes, either entirely or in part, ► as a result of which that person becomes naked or improperly dressed, ≈ which is considered a shameful thing to do

H2477.def: = town; ◄ in {L:Assyria<SDBH:אַשּׁוּר>}, along the river {L:Habor<SDBH:חָבֹור>}; ► one of the places where the exiles from {L:Samaria<SDBH:שֹׁמְרֹון>} were relocated

H2249.def: = river, ◄ located in Mesopotamia; ► eastern tributary of the {L:Euphrates<SDBH:פְּרָת>}

H2024.def: = town; ◄ in {L:Assyria<SDBH:אַשּׁוּר>}, along the river {L:Habor<SDBH:חָבֹור>}; ► one of the places where the exiles from {L:Samaria<SDBH:שֹׁמְרֹון>} were relocated

H1470.def: = town; ◄ in {L:Assyria<SDBH:אַשּׁוּר>}, along the river {L:Habor<SDBH:חָבֹור>}; ► one of the places where the exiles from {L:Samaria<SDBH:שֹׁמְרֹון>} were relocated

H5704.def: particle linking an event to a point in space; = relation indicating that event X ends at point in space Y

H3117.def: = the time of day that it is light, as opposed to the time that it is dark
